10 + 456 = 1D2
456 + -54 = 192
-94 - 63 = FFFFFFF63
44 * 5 = 0000000DC
65 - 45 = 14
123.456 + -789.456 = FFD660000
485.2 - -3.1254 = 001E8534D
6.321 * -7.8945 = FFFCE1950
456.2 * 1.4896 = 002A78E36
23 * 3 = 45

0000000000500001
